channel.title: Your chance
channel.description:
By the 13th of December, I plan to have finished my server, and have it hosted. It's going through development now. What I want is a mini-game that is unique to my server and I'm looking for Ideas. The mini-game is supposed to be Christmas themed, so, Keep it Christmassy. This is your chance to have your mini-game put into a server. Nothing is too much, so post below. You can post ideas for prizes and stuff. I'm using Silabsoft client, so knock yourself out.
Many Thanks,
Syrillia.

item.title: Your chance
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

Well since you put it like that, yes. I’ll do the coding and stuff, I just couldn’t think for shit what would make it decent. I just made a mini-game, but it was too easy and the prizes were too great. I’m writing it again.

Read full topic

item.description:
@tedyslilnoob wrote:

[quote=“Syrillia, post:12, topic:159472”]I was going to make you deliver Christmas toys. but I dunno. Where should the player start, what should the player have to do? What should be the reward?

I was going to do late Halloween one. But it would be way to late.[/quote]

Maybe do it at the place jagex used last year? the room full of boxes and stuff :P?

Reward: A new EMOTE + Santa costume (client sided) or a holiday item

mayeb they have to kill these NPC that taken over the workshop, and they drop parts to toys, and you have to collect all parts, and then talk to santa to make the toy real

XD
